Skills
HTML5
It builds the skeleton of site or app, and the fifth version allows to create a more SEO-optimized structure for product.
CSS3
It allows you to create absolutely any appearance of the site or application. Everything is limited only by imagination.
Java Script
This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.
Jquery
The Jquery library will speed up development. It takes frequent, repetitive tasks, strips out all unnecessary markup, and makes them easy to understand.
React
This library allows you to create web applications. Сan create the most interactive product exactly for the client's goals.
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for the product - “brains” that will perform actions that the user does not see.
Mongo.db
This is a non-relational database that will store website or application data.
